articles.description: Megastar Chiranjeevi couldn't control his excitement as 'cinematic genius' James Cameron heaps praise on his son Ram Charan's role in RRR. Keep scrolling to read more about it!

articles.title: Taj Divided by Blood trailer out! Naseeruddin Shah as Akbar is on a quest to find a worthy successor - India Today
articles.description: The makers of the period drama Taj Divided By Blood released the trailer. The show which features Dharmendra, Nasseruddin Shah, and more stars, will premiere on ZEE5 on March 3.
articles.content: By Prachi Arya: After treating fans with a glimpse of the entire star cast of the magnum opus Taj Divided by Blood, the makers dropped the trailer. Featuring Dharmendra as Shaikh Salim Chisti and Nas… [+1950 chars]

articles.author: The Tribune India
articles.title: 'Mirzapur' actor Shahnawaz Pradhan dies of heart attack - The Tribune India
articles.description: Shahnawaz Pradhan, best known for featuring in series ‘Mirzapur’ and movie ‘Raees’, has died following a heart attack, actor Yashpal Sharma said.
articles.content:
PTI
Mumbai, February 18
Shahnawaz Pradhan, best known for featuring in series ‘Mirzapur’ and movie ‘Raees’, has died following a heart attack, actor Yashpal Sharma said.
He was in his late 50s.

articles.title: Godrej buys Raj Kapoor's iconic bungalow - The Tribune India
articles.description: Once the location of all-night film story sessions and the venue of Rishi Kapoor’s marriage to Neetu Singh, Godrej Properties has bought the iconic bungalow of legendary film actor and director Raj Kapoor.
articles.content:
